div.head: To make sleep
div.ab: Take a tooth from a dead fox (lit. a that is a carcass), and lay it under he who cannot sleep, so will he sleep from it. And one who is close to sleep(?), hang on (him?) a tooth from a living fox, so will he sleep (???), certainly.

A woman who wants to make [herself] shine must take as many eggs as she wants, and she must lay them in the strongest vinegar that you can have, and the eggs must lay in the vinegar for four days so goes the (???) from the eggs, then she must neatly take the eggs out of the vinegar, and poke(?) the eggs with a needle(?), so light water [comes] out of the eggs and with the water, she must wash her face, which will make it glitter, certainly.
